packages.title: Srinagar Weekend Escape
packages.short: 2 nights | Houseboat stay on Dal Lake, Shikara ride, Mughal gardens.
itinerary: Day 2: Mughal Gardens, local markets, depart

packages.title: Gulmarg Adventure Day
packages.short: 1 day | Gondola ride to Apharwat Peak, meadow walks.

packages.title: Pahalgam Retreat
packages.short: 3 days | Pine valley walks, Aru & Betaab Valley visit.

packages.title: Sonmarg Day Trip
packages.short: 1 day | Glacial views, short hikes, river views.
itinerary: Optional short hike to Thajiwas Glacier

packages.title: Kashmir Family Holiday
packages.short: 5 days | Srinagar, Gulmarg, Pahalgam family-friendly itinerary.

packages.title: Romantic Srinagar Honeymoon
packages.short: 3 days | Private houseboat & candlelight dinner, shikara.

packages.title: Wildlife & Nature (Dachigam)
packages.short: 2 days | Dachigam National Park, guided nature walks.
itinerary: Guided nature walk with local naturalist

packages.title: Ladakh Gateway (Srinagar-Leh)
packages.short: 7 days | Srinagar to Leh road trip, high-altitude views.

packages.title: Photography Tour
packages.short: 4 days | Sunrise/sunset locations, local guides for photographers.

packages.title: Trekking Intro (Kashmir)
packages.short: 5 days | Moderate treks, expert guide, camping basics.

packages.title: Culture & Cuisine Experience
packages.short: 3 days | Local markets, cooking class, Kashmiri wazwan tasting.

packages.title: Off‑season Deals (Winter)
packages.short: 4 days | Snow activities, Gulmarg skiing options, cozy houseboat stay.
